Title: Rati Chakravyuh
Writer: Ashish Avikunthak, Ashish Avikunthak (story), Ashish Avikunthak, Sougata Mukherjee
Actors: Joyraj Bhattacharya, Sharmistha Nag, Mandira Banerjee, Udvas Roy
Plot: On a lunar eclipse midnight, in a desolate temple, six young newlywed couples and a priestess meet after a mass wedding. They sit in a circle and talk. This their last conversation - an ...
